field.name: pa_ratio
field.description: ratio of absence to presence points
field.title: absence-presence ratio

field.name: pa_strategy
field.description: strategy to generate pseudo-absence points: random, in sites with contrasting conditions to presences (SRE), or within a min and max distance from occurrence sites
field.title: pseudo-absence strategy

field.name: pa_sre_quant
field.description: the quantile used for SRE calculation in for the 'SRE' pseudo-absence generation strategy
field.title: pseudo-absence SRE quantile

field.name: pa_disk_min
field.description: minimum distance from occurrence sites for the 'disk' pseudo-absence generation strategy
field.title: pseudo-absence disk minimum distance

field.name: pa_disk_max
field.description: maximum distance from occurrence sites for the 'disk' pseudo-absence generation strategy
field.title: pseudo-absence disk maximum distance
